name: Last One Left (vajdad4m)
description:
This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam #149 with the theme Last One Left.

In this game you play as the "Last One Left".
An apocalypse wiped out humanity.
You are the LAST human on Earth.
Shoot your way through the zombie horde, and revive humanity!

NOTE!
* This game uses scripts to move your mouse.
* If you want to get the mouse out of the screen, you should exit the game from the menu, or use the "Alt + Tab" combination.
* You can go back to the main menu by pressing "Esc" on your keyboard.

All code and music is made by me.
